about_the_game:
Nightfall Secrets is a horror investigation game that combines tension, mystery, and a chilling atmosphere. Players, either solo or with a team of up to 4, will dive into a world filled with dark secrets where they must search for clues, solve puzzles, and face supernatural horrors lurking in every corner. With a dynamic story and choices that shape the gameplay, every step you take could reveal or conceal a darker truth. Will you and your team uncover the secrets behind a night of terror, or become part of the unsolved mystery?

  • Co-op Investigation: Play solo or team up with up to 4 players, working together to uncover clues and face the lurking threats.

  • Chilling Environments: Explore dark and atmospheric locations that hide secrets waiting to be discovered.

  • Solve Puzzles: Use investigation tools to gather evidence and solve puzzles that bring you closer to the truth.

  • Supernatural Horror: Each night brings new threats, with dark entities watching and creating constant tension and fear.

  • Dynamic Story: Your choices will affect the direction of the story. Will you trust those around you, or question everything you see?

  • Replayability: With random story elements and changing layouts, each playthrough offers a unique and fresh experience.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains horror elements involving the investigation of mysterious cases and supernatural disturbances. In some scenarios, players may encounter dead bodies or unsettling paranormal events designed to create a tense and eerie atmosphere.

There is no depiction of sexual acts, sexual violence, drug or alcohol use, or self-harm. The focus is on investigation and psychological horror without gratuitous or overly graphic content.

This game may not be suitable for players sensitive to themes of death or intense horror.
